title.narrative: Consultancy - Communication of the Strategic Sector Cooperation

description.narrative:
The purpose of the consultancy is to strengthen communication by and about the Strategic Sector Cooperation.
The assignment will be conducted from the 20th September 2021 to the 31st March 2022. Key results: Strengthened communication regarding Strategic Sector Cooperation and development activities relevant to COP26 supported by, inter alia, delivering communication products illustrating best practices, pitching products to external media etc.
Strategic communication about Danish development activities and results are key to ensure accountability towards stakeholders and partners. The purpose of the assignment is to strengthen communication regarding Strategic Sector Cooperation in support of on-going projects and the new strategic framework MYNSAM 2.0. In addition, the assignment will support the communication about COP26 relevant development activities. The consultant will pro-vide hands on support to sector counsellors and project managers to help meet their communication needs and support valuable communication on Danish development activities in support of Danish efforts to achieve a strong and ambitious COP26 out-come.
